import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import '../Form/index.css'; import axios from 'axios'; const initialValue = { file: '', name: '', address: '', complement: '', uf: '', city: '', date: '', time: '', price: 0, } export default function CreateEventForm() { const [values, setValues] = useState(initialValue) const history = useHistory(); //isso vai garantir que meus inputs sempre guardem na memÃ³ria a ultima entrada function onChange(ev) { const { name, value } = ev.target; setValues({ ...values, [name]: value }) } function onSubmit(ev) { ev.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://localhost:3000/list', values) .then((response) => { history.push('/') }); } return (
